actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Reported by Senator Helms without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 28.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution urging the immediate release of Kosovar Albanians wrongfully imprisoned in Serbia, and for other purposes.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Calls on the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia (FRY) and Serbian authorities to provide a complete and precise accounting of all Kosovar Albanians held in any Serbian prison or other detention facility.Urges: (1) the immediate release of all Kosovar Albanians wrongfully held in Serbia; and (2) the European Union and all countries to act collectively with the United States in exerting pressure on the Government of the FRY and of Serbia to release all such prisoners.

titles.title: A resolution urging the immediate release of Kosovar Albanians wrongfully imprisoned in Serbia, and for other purposes.
